snippet: MONNIG--Hugo, 93, in Palm Springs, CA. Survived by brother George; daughters Lore Monnig, Lindsay Holbrook and Lisa Miller; and three grandchildren. Born in St. Louis, MO. Graduated Harvard and University of Virginia Law School. United States Army 1943-1945. Attorney at Milbank Tweed, Hadley & McCloy; Sherman & Sterling and Kennecott Corporation. Board Member at Empire Blue Cross-Blue Shield. Predeceased by wives Lulie Engelsmann, Jacqueline Forsyth and Lisa Powers. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MONNIG--Hugo, 93, in Palm Springs, CA. Survived by brother George; daughters Lore Monnig, Lindsay Holbrook and Lisa Miller; and three grandchildren. Born in St. Louis, MO.
